entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero except minus 3 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low zero except minus 3 inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
